about_the_game:
Embark on a magical, musical odyssey in Billie Bust Up, a 3D platformer inspired by your favorite timeless, tuneful, and imaginative animated films.

Play the lead role as an adventurous and headstrong young goat named Billie on a quest to follow in her long-lost father’s hoofsteps and reclaim a powerful magic. Alongside your mystic axolotl mentor Aristotle and playable pet fox Oscar, you’ll explore strange realms, take on showstopping villains with their own unforgettable songs, master incredible magical powers, and discover a darkly fantastic world where skillful gameplay and memorable music are harmoniously intertwined.


Move to the music
Put your platforming and musical talents in the spotlight in fun, challenging rhythm-based battles. Attacks drop to the beat, and lyrics clue you in to what’s coming next. The music adapts to the way you play, and every song mixes things up with new and different gameplay experiences.

An enchanting ensemble
Grinning ghosts offering grim party invitations. Feline smugglers. Puppets pulling strings of their own. Adventure alongside a charming cast of brave heroes and sinister villains, each with their own complex backstories and personalities.

For the young at heart
Drawing inspiration from animated classics that stand the test of time, Billie Bust Up mixes fanciful fantasy with thrills, humor, pathos, and heart. Discover a tale of friendship, family, and the shadowy secrets that sometimes lurk behind the most vibrant exteriors.

Showstopping songs
Each main character has their own signature song revealing their personality and motives, composed by Emmy-nominated musician Daniel Ingram (My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic). Bust out your own vocals with an optional sing-a-long mode for every song!

Incredible magic powers
Tap into a symphony of awesome abilities to take on the world’s challenges. Glide over obstacles with your umbrella wand. Conjure protective shields and freezing ice. Tackle tricky situations with distracting decoys or by turning invisi-Billie.

A welcoming world
Accessibility features like UI color and sizing options, assist modes, and options for visual and audio cues help ensure more people can join the fun.

name: Billie Bust Up

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8750H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on a thrilling and imaginative odyssey in a 3D platforming musical inspired by your favorite timeless, magical animated films. Meet a fantastical cast of characters, take gameplay cues from the music—and try not to let the villains’ songs get stuck in your head.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
